title: Isabella and the magic brush
brief_description: An animated fantasy, adapted from a Chinese fairytale, about a young girl whose desire to be an artist is thwarted by poverty, a tyrant king, and her parents, until she receives a magic brush. Animated by Barbara Dourmashkin, narrated by Alice Playton. Suitable for primary school level.
